CLEVELAND, Ohio Browns should tank the rest of the season to get a real QB in next years draft.
Thats the first email I saw after the Browns lost 16-6 to Las Vegas in their last game before the bye … [+5240 chars]

articles.author: Kirk Fox
articles.title: Tom Heinsohn obituary: Boston Celtics legend dies at 86 - Legacy.com
articles.description: Tom Heinsohn, Boston Celtics legend of the '50s and '60s who later became the team's head coach and color commentator, died at the age of 83.
articles.content:
Boston Celtics legend Tom Heinsohn won 10 championships with the franchise as a player and head coach.
<ul><li>Details of death: Died at the age of 86, announced today by the Boston Celtics, date of… [+1497 chars]
